title: Parliament heats up over Rambukkana killing
body_lines: Parliament sittings were suspended shortly after commencement today morning after SJB MPs protested against the killing of a man by police in Rambukkana yesterday.

Speaker Mahinda Yapa Abeyawardene suspended the sittings as the MPs who worse shirts with print of  a blood stained hand shouted angrily at the killing of the man shot dead byvpolice as they fired on protesters demanding fuel.
